code: import React from"react";import"./testimonials.css";import Data from"./Data";import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from'swiper/react';import"swiper/css";import"swiper/css/pagination";import{Pagination}from'swiper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Testimonials=function Testimonials(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"testimonial container section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"People I worked with say"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"Scroll to look through all of them"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{className:"testimonial__container",loop:true,grabCursor:true,spaceBetween:24,pagination:{clickable:true},breakpoints:{576:{slidesPerView:2},768:{slidesPerView:2,spaceBetween:48}},modules:{Pagination:Pagination},children:Data.map(function(_ref){var id=_ref.id,image=_ref.image,title=_ref.title,description=_ref.description;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SwiperSlide,{className:"testimonial__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"person's photo",className:"testimonial__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"testimonial__name",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonial__description",children:description})]},id);})})]});};export default Testimonials;
